dmca.title: D.M.C.A issue: www.freevideoprofessorcd.com
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Michael Angiolillo [mailto:mangioli@videoprofessor.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, May 03, 2005 10:40 AM
To: legal@theplanet.com
Subject: D.M.C.A issue: www.freevideoprofessorcd.com


 
 
 
 
 
 

May 3, 2005
 
SENT VIA EMAIL: legal@theplanet.com
 
Mr. Lance Crosby, Esq.
The Planet.com Internet Services, Inc.
1333 Stemmons #110
Dallas, TX. 75207
 
Re: www.freevideoprofessorcd.com
 
Dear Mr. Crosby: 
 
            This Notification of Claimed Infringement is sent to you as The
Planet.com Internet Services, Inc. Designated to Receive Notice of Claimed
Infringement pursuant to the U.S. Digital Millennium Copyright Act, 17 U.S.
Code Section 512. Video Professor, Inc. is the owner of valuable copyrights
and trademarks which are being infringed by the website,
<http://www.wwwvideoprofessor.com/>  www.freevideoprofessorcd.com , which we
understand is hosted by The Planet.com Internet Services, Inc.
Specifically, the owner of the www.freevideoprofessorcd.com website has
copied Video Professor's copyrighted and trademarked materials posted on
Video Professor's website at www.videoprofessor.com and copied them to his
site at www.freevideoprofessorcd.com We have a good faith belief that use of
the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by Video
Professor, Inc., any agents or the law.
 
The information in this notice is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, I
am authorized to act on behalf of the copyright owner, Video Professor, Inc.
Thank you in advance for expeditiously disabling access to the website as
required by the DMCA.
 
Sincerely,
 
Michael Angiolillo
Paralegal
Video Professor, Inc.
12055 W. 2nd Place
Lakewood, CO 80228
V: 303-232-1244 x 146
F: 303-202-9929
E: mangioli@videoprofessor.com
